title: Mid South Was Canceled
content:
The famous Oklahoma gravel race, Mid South, got canceled due to wildfires that spread around Stillwater on Friday afternoon.

If you can, consider donating to the Mid South Stillwater Wildfire relief fund.

Miguel shares a glimpse from his experience and will have more on the way soonâ€¦

The post Mid South Was Canceled appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
